pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇavāsikā bhikkhuniyo yāguyā kilamanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:6.3: Atha kho so pūgo bhikkhunīnaṃ yāguatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:6.4: “amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare yāguatthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto, tato taṇḍulaṃ āharāpetvā yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:6.5: Bhikkhuniyo tena parikkhārena bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.1: So pūgo jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.2: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:9.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:12.2: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:12.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:12.7: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:13.1: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:13.2: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np8:13.3: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
